TopicTitle: Share craft for Retrieving units from orbit

Articles.Content:
Please share your craft design/s for "retrieve unit from orbit" mission.

I built one with 2.5 service bay on top but it would not "scoop" object, only could get within 8 meters ;(
Note this is gonna get moved to the spacecraft exchange thread

Not a whole craft, but the tube with the Claw and the parachutes attached is retrieving the shuttle type capsule from LKO in this picture: Just build a rocket to get the tube into space. [http://i.imgur.com/ywJ3sPW.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ywJ3sPW.jpg)

![hrl7zoI.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/hrl7zoI.jpg)

A word of advice: drop the vernors, use monoprop and standard RCS blocks. Too much RCS power in too little mass and SAS goes totally crazy burning through fuel like there was no tomorrow.

This is the complete rocket I use to recover stuff from LKO.

![dZBDdB6.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/dZBDdB6.jpg)

I've brought back a 3.5 tonne object from LKO with this one. 

ETA- it costs 16,460 funds.

![screenshot345_zpsolnazihn.jpg](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/swampmonster/Kerbal%20space%20program/screenshot345_zpsolnazihn.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-13T13:23:34Z" title="08/13/2015 01:23  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 13, 2015</time> by Reactordrone**

only have this one screenie from it, but it worked pretty well

![Hc5NzEg.png](http://i.imgur.com/Hc5NzEg.png)

it's made of that flat engine from NFT, a tank, decoupler, that honeybadger reaction wheel/rcs combo thing from RD's FTT, and a mk3 cargo bay, with a claw inside it (the 2 mod parts can easily replaced by stock modules), lots of chutes and a heatshield at the front.

Catch the part (somewhere floating in the background in the pic), deorbit, decouple the engine block and use the chutes to land.
